title: How long will the PROJECT crafting be available?
body: Was just curious as to how long the PROJECT chests and such would be available for.

replies.body:
The PROJECT: DISRUPTION event ends at 23:59 PT on August 16th. All crafting materials will remain in your Hextech inventory after the event is over. At that time you'll be able to disenchant any of those materials into essences if you so choose. For complete details, [check out our FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ)

Let me know if you have any questions.
